mapper.select:
select bi.id,bi.material_nb,bi.sscc_number,mm.name as material_name,bi.batch_nb,bi.expire_date,bi.ware_code,bi.recommend_bin_code, bi.actual_bin_code,bi.quantity,bi.pallet_code,bi.pallet_type,bi.status, bi.create_by,bi.create_time,bi.plant_nb,bi.move_type from bi_in bi left join md_material mm on bi.material_nb = mm.code where bi.delete_flag=0 and bi.material_nb like concat('%', #{materialNb}, '%') and bi.sscc_number like concat('%', #{ssccNumber}, '%') and bi.move_type like concat('%', #{moveType}, '%') and mm.name like concat('%', #{materialName}, '%') and bi.pallet_code like concat('%', #{palletCode}, '%')
and bi.batch_nb like concat('%', #{batchNb}, '%') and bi.plant_nb like concat('%', #{plantNb}, '%') and bi.ware_code like concat('%', #{wareCode}, '%') and bi.actual_bin_code like concat('%', #{actualBinCode}, '%') and bi.create_by like concat('%', #{createBy}, '%') and bi.status = #{status}

select bi.id, bi.material_nb, bi.sscc_number, mm.name as material_name, bi.batch_nb, bi.expire_date, bi.plant_nb, bi.ware_code, bi.recommend_bin_code, bi.actual_bin_code, bi.quantity, bi.pallet_code, bi.pallet_type, bi.status, bi.create_by, bi.create_time from bi_in bi left join md_material mm on bi.material_nb = mm.code where bi.sscc_number = #{sscc} and mm.delete_flag = 0 order by bi.create_time desc limit 1

select si.id, si.plant_nb, si.ware_code, si.sscc_number, si.batch_nb, si.material_nb, si.check_type, mm.name as material_name, si.check_quantity, si.min_standard, si.max_standard, si.actual_quantity, si.actual_result, si.average_result, si.operate_user, si.operate_time, si.original_pallet_quantity, si.from_purchase_order from si_material_in si left join md_material mm on si.material_nb = mm.code where si.delete_flag = 0 and mm.delete_flag = 0 and si.sscc_number not in (select bi.sscc_number from bi_in bi where bi.delete_flag = 0) order by operate_time desc
